body_html:
Hi ezyang,

I built PyTorch from the source code. The command I used to install PyTorch is:

git submodule update --init
sudo pip install -r requirements.txt
sudo python setup.py install

Thanks for your reply!

body:
Hi ezyang,

I built PyTorch from the source code. The command I used to install PyTorch is:

`git submodule update --init`
`sudo pip install -r requirements.txt`
`sudo python setup.py install`

Thanks for your reply!
